question: One of the reasons for India's occupational structure remaining more or less the same over the years has been that
option1: investment pattern has been directed towards capital intensive industries
option2: productivity in agriculture has been high enough to induce people to stay with agriculture
option3: ceiling on land holdings have enabled more people to own land and hence their preference to stay with agriculture
option4: people are largely unaware of the significance of transition from agriculture to industry for economic development
answer: investment pattern has been directed towards capital intensive industries
explanation: No answer description available for this question. Let us discuss.
